title: fix(kpi): fix churn calculation and optimize Tinybird queries
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Improved churn calculation accuracy and optimized Tinybird queries for 10x faster performance on internal dashboards.
gist.impact: Ensures accurate retention metrics and significantly faster data loading for team analytics.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee acting as a data analyst, fixing a pixelated line graph on a retro monitor. The graph turns from red/broken to green/smooth. Represents fixing the churn calculation and speed.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee adjusting a glowing line graph on a retro computer terminal. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like a management sim game. Emotionally warm, productive.
